column1: 10 – DMU/EMU from Leeds, Sheffield, Humberside area, Lincolnshire andPeterborough.  Any reduction must be specially agreed

a) Trains from the Sheffield direction arriving into Platform 3b will hold the overlap so trains cannot arrive intoPlatform 1 from the Up Main line/Leeds Line.  Trains from the Shaftholme Junction direction can access Platform 1simultaneously by using the Down Thorne Slow line which will add an extra 1 minute running time.  This should beshown in the timetable as Adjustment allowance.b) Trains longer than 234m arriving in the Up direction into Platform 3a will foul the block joint in rear and prevent
